title: Rate of flow of water in a tank part - c

content.description:
A 12,000-liter tank of water is filled to capacity. At time t = 0, water begins to drain out of the tank at a rate modeled by r(t), measured in liters per hour, where r is given by the piecewise-defined function 

<math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>r</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mo>=</mo> <mrow> <mo>{</mo> <mtable columnalign="left"> <mtr> <mtd> <mfrac> <mrow> <mn>600</mn> <mi>t</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>t</mi> <mo>+</mo> <mn>3</mn> </mrow> </mfrac> <mtext>             for </mtext> <mn>0</mn> <mo>≤</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>≤</mo> <mn>5</mn> </mtd> </mtr> <mtr> <mtd> <mn>1000</mn> <msup> <mi>e</mi> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>0.2</mn> <mi>t</mi> </mrow> </msup> <mtext>   for </mtext> <mi>t</mi> <mo>></mo> <mn>5</mn> </mtd> </mtr> </mtable> </mrow> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamOCamaabm aabaaeaaaaaaaaa8qacaWG0baapaGaayjkaiaawMcaa8qacqGH9aqp daGabaabaeqabaWaaSaaaeaacaaI2aGaaGimaiaaicdacaWG0baaba GaamiDaiabgUcaRiaaiodaaaGaaeiiaiaabccacaqGGaGaaeiiaiaa bccacaqGGaGaaeiiaiaabccacaqGGaGaaeiiaiaabccacaqGGaGaae iiaiaabAgacaqGVbGaaeOCaiaabccacaaIWaGaeyizImQaamiDaiab gsMiJkaaiwdaaeaacaaIXaGaaGimaiaaicdacaaIWaGaamyza8aada ahaaWcbeqaa8qacqGHsislpaGaaGimaiaac6cacaaIYaGaamiDaaaa kiaabccacaqGGaGaaeiiaiaabAgacaqGVbGaaeOCaiaabccacaWG0b GaeyOpa4JaaGynaaaapeGaay5Eaaaaaa@63B2@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>
content.question: Find r'(3) . Using correct units, explain the meaning of that value in the context of this problem.

frqParts.text: Find r'(3) . Using correct units, explain the meaning of that value in the context of this problem.

topic.text: 4.1: Interpreting the Meaning of the Derivative in Context

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify common underlying structures in problems involving different contextual situations.
